Package terra

Class Base

java.lang.Object
terra.Base
public class Base extends Object
Author:
Eddie Ouyang Base class used in Building phase that represents the Player's land

    • buy

      public boolean buy(int x, int y, Tower t)
      Buys a tower on a tile
      Parameters:
      x - X coordinate in Tiles
      y - Y coordinate in Tiles
      t - Tower to purchase
      Returns:
      True if purchase was successful, false otherwise
